memberdef.name: activity_map
memberdef.initializer: = { { "appointment", SephonePresenceActivityAppointment }, { "away", SephonePresenceActivityAway }, { "breakfast", SephonePresenceActivityBreakfast }, { "busy", SephonePresenceActivityBusy }, { "dinner", SephonePresenceActivityDinner }, { "holiday", SephonePresenceActivityHoliday }, { "in-transit", SephonePresenceActivityInTransit }, { "looking-for-work", SephonePresenceActivityLookingForWork }, { "lunch", SephonePresenceActivityLunch }, { "meal", SephonePresenceActivityMeal }, { "meeting", SephonePresenceActivityMeeting }, { "on-the-phone", SephonePresenceActivityOnThePhone }, { "other", SephonePresenceActivityOther }, { "performance", SephonePresenceActivityPerformance }, { "permanent-absence", SephonePresenceActivityPermanentAbsence }, { "playing", SephonePresenceActivityPlaying }, { "presentation", SephonePresenceActivityPresentation }, { "shopping", SephonePresenceActivityShopping }, { "sleeping", SephonePresenceActivitySleeping }, { "spectator", SephonePresenceActivitySpectator }, { "steering", SephonePresenceActivitySteering }, { "travel", SephonePresenceActivityTravel }, { "tv", SephonePresenceActivityTV }, { "unknown", SephonePresenceActivityUnknown }, { "vacation", SephonePresenceActivityVacation }, { "working", SephonePresenceActivityWorking }, { "worship", SephonePresenceActivityWorship } }

detaileddescription.para:
Creates a presence model specifying an activity.
activity
The activity to set for the created presence model.
description
An additional description of the activity (mainly useful for the 'other' activity). Set it to NULL to not add a description.
The created presence model, or NULL if an error occured.
sephone_presence_model_new
sephone_presence_model_new_with_activity_and_note The created presence model has the activity specified in the parameters.

memberdef.argsstring: (SephonePresenceActivityType acttype, const char *description, const char *note, const char *lang)
memberdef.name: sephone_presence_model_new_with_activity_and_note

detaileddescription.para:
Creates a presence model specifying an activity and adding a note.
activity
The activity to set for the created presence model.
description
An additional description of the activity (mainly useful for the 'other' activity). Set it to NULL to not add a description.
note
An additional note giving additional information about the contact presence.
lang
The language the note is written in. It can be set to NULL in order to not specify the language of the note.
The created presence model, or NULL if an error occured.
sephone_presence_model_new_with_activity
sephone_presence_model_new_with_activity_and_note The created presence model has the activity and the note specified in the parameters.

Gets the basic status of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to get the basic status from.
The SephonePresenceBasicStatus of the SephonePresenceModel object given as parameter.

Sets the basic status of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which to set the basic status.
basic_status
The SephonePresenceBasicStatus to set for the SephonePresenceModel object.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Gets the timestamp of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to get the timestamp from.
The timestamp of the SephonePresenceModel object or -1 on error.

Gets the contact of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to get the contact from.
A pointer to a dynamically allocated string containing the contact, or NULL if no contact is found. The returned string is to be freed by calling ms_free().

Sets the contact of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which to set the contact.
contact
The contact string to set.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Gets the first activity of a presence model (there is usually only one).
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to get the activity from.
A SephonePresenceActivity object if successful, NULL otherwise.

Sets the activity of a presence model (limits to only one activity).
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which to set the activity.
activity
The SephonePresenceActivityType to set for the model.
description
An additional description of the activity to set for the model. Can be NULL if no additional description is to be added.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error. WARNING: This function will modify the basic status of the model according to the activity being set. If you don't want the basic status to be modified automatically, you can use the combination of sephone_presence_model_set_basic_status(), sephone_presence_model_clear_activities() and sephone_presence_model_add_activity().

Gets the number of activities included in the presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to get the number of activities from.
The number of activities included in the SephonePresenceModel object.

Gets the nth activity of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to get the activity from.
idx
The index of the activity to get (the first activity having the index 0).
A pointer to a SephonePresenceActivity object if successful, NULL otherwise.

Adds an activity to a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which to add an activity.
activity
The SephonePresenceActivity object to add to the model.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Clears the activities of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which to clear the activities.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Gets the first note of a presence model (there is usually only one).
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to get the note from.
lang
The language of the note to get. Can be NULL to get a note that has no language specified or to get the first note whatever language it is written into.
A pointer to a SephonePresenceNote object if successful, NULL otherwise.

Adds a note to a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to add a note to.
note_content
The note to be added to the presence model.
lang
The language of the note to be added. Can be NULL if no language is to be specified for the note.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error. Only one note for each language can be set, so e.g. setting a note for the 'fr' language if there is only one will replace the existing one.

Clears all the notes of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel for which to clear notes.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Creates a default presence model.
The created presence model, NULL on error.
sephone_presence_model_new_with_activity
sephone_presence_model_new_with_activity_and_note The created presence model is considered 'offline'.

Gets the number of services included in the presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to get the number of services from.
The number of services included in the SephonePresenceModel object.

Gets the nth service of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to get the service from.
idx
The index of the service to get (the first service having the index 0).
A pointer to a SephonePresenceService object if successful, NULL otherwise.

Adds a service to a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which to add a service.
service
The SephonePresenceService object to add to the model.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Clears the services of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which to clear the services.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Gets the number of persons included in the presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to get the number of persons from.
The number of persons included in the SephonePresenceModel object.

Gets the nth person of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object to get the person from.
idx
The index of the person to get (the first person having the index 0).
A pointer to a SephonePresencePerson object if successful, NULL otherwise.

Adds a person to a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which to add a person.
person
The SephonePresencePerson object to add to the model.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Clears the persons of a presence model.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which to clear the persons.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Creates a presence service.
id
The id of the presence service to be created. Can be NULL to generate it automatically.
basic_status
The SephonePresenceBasicStatus to set for the SephonePresenceService object.
contact
The contact string to set.
The created presence service, NULL on error. The created presence service has the basic status 'closed'.

Gets the id of a presence service.
service
The SephonePresenceService object to get the id from.
A pointer to a dynamically allocated string containing the id, or NULL in case of error. The returned string is to be freed by calling ms_free().

Sets the id of a presence service.
service
The SephonePresenceService object for which to set the id.
id
The id string to set. Can be NULL to generate it automatically.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Gets the basic status of a presence service.
service
The SephonePresenceService object to get the basic status from.
The SephonePresenceBasicStatus of the SephonePresenceService object given as parameter.

Sets the basic status of a presence service.
service
The SephonePresenceService object for which to set the basic status.
basic_status
The SephonePresenceBasicStatus to set for the SephonePresenceService object.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Gets the contact of a presence service.
service
The SephonePresenceService object to get the contact from.
A pointer to a dynamically allocated string containing the contact, or NULL if no contact is found. The returned string is to be freed by calling ms_free().

Sets the contact of a presence service.
service
The SephonePresenceService object for which to set the contact.
contact
The contact string to set.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Gets the number of notes included in the presence service.
service
The SephonePresenceService object to get the number of notes from.
The number of notes included in the SephonePresenceService object.

Gets the nth note of a presence service.
service
The SephonePresenceService object to get the note from.
idx
The index of the note to get (the first note having the index 0).
A pointer to a SephonePresenceNote object if successful, NULL otherwise.

Adds a note to a presence service.
service
The SephonePresenceService object for which to add a note.
note
The SephonePresenceNote object to add to the service.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Clears the notes of a presence service.
service
The SephonePresenceService object for which to clear the notes.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Creates a presence person.
id
The id of the presence person to be created. Can be NULL to generate it automatically.
The created presence person, NULL on error.

Gets the id of a presence person.
person
The SephonePresencePerson object to get the id from.
A pointer to a dynamically allocated string containing the id, or NULL in case of error. The returned string is to be freed by calling ms_free().

Sets the id of a presence person.
person
The SephonePresencePerson object for which to set the id.
id
The id string to set. Can be NULL to generate it automatically.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

person
The SephonePresencePerson object to get the number of activities from.
The number of activities included in the SephonePresencePerson object.

person
The SephonePresencePerson object to get the activity from.
idx
The index of the activity to get (the first activity having the index 0).
A pointer to a SephonePresenceActivity object if successful, NULL otherwise.

person
The SephonePresencePerson object for which to add an activity.
activity
The SephonePresenceActivity object to add to the person.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

person
The SephonePresencePerson object for which to clear the activities.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Gets the number of notes included in the presence person.
person
The SephonePresencePerson object to get the number of notes from.
The number of notes included in the SephonePresencePerson object.

Gets the nth note of a presence person.
person
The SephonePresencePerson object to get the note from.
idx
The index of the note to get (the first note having the index 0).
A pointer to a SephonePresenceNote object if successful, NULL otherwise.

Adds a note to a presence person.
person
The SephonePresencePerson object for which to add a note.
note
The SephonePresenceNote object to add to the person.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Clears the notes of a presence person.
person
The SephonePresencePerson object for which to clear the notes.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Gets the number of activities notes included in the presence person.
person
The SephonePresencePerson object to get the number of activities notes from.
The number of activities notes included in the SephonePresencePerson object.

Gets the nth activities note of a presence person.
person
The SephonePresencePerson object to get the activities note from.
idx
The index of the activities note to get (the first note having the index 0).
A pointer to a SephonePresenceNote object if successful, NULL otherwise.

Adds an activities note to a presence person.
person
The SephonePresencePerson object for which to add an activities note.
note
The SephonePresenceNote object to add to the person.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Clears the activities notes of a presence person.
person
The SephonePresencePerson object for which to clear the activities notes.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Creates a presence activity.
acttype
The SephonePresenceActivityType to set for the activity.
description
An additional description of the activity to set for the activity. Can be NULL if no additional description is to be added.
The created presence activity, NULL on error.

Gets the string representation of a presence activity.
activity
A pointer to the SephonePresenceActivity object for which to get a string representation.
A pointer a dynamically allocated string representing the given activity. The returned string is to be freed by calling ms_free().

Gets the activity type of a presence activity.
activity
A pointer to the SephonePresenceActivity for which to get the type.
The SephonePresenceActivityType of the activity.

Sets the type of activity of a presence activity.
activity
The SephonePresenceActivity for which to set for the activity type.
acttype
The activity type to set for the activity.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Gets the description of a presence activity.
activity
A pointer to the SephonePresenceActivity for which to get the description.
A pointer to the description string of the presence activity, or NULL if no description is specified.

Sets the description of a presence activity.
activity
The SephonePresenceActivity object for which to set the description.
description
An additional description of the activity. Can be NULL if no additional description is to be added.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Creates a presence note.
content
The content of the note to be created.
lang
The language of the note to be created. Can be NULL if no language is to be specified for the note.
The created presence note, NULL on error.

Gets the content of a presence note.
note
A pointer to the SephonePresenceNote for which to get the content.
A pointer to the content of the presence note.

Sets the content of a presence note.
note
The SephonePresenceNote object for which to set the content.
content
The content of the note.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Gets the language of a presence note.
note
A pointer to the SephonePresenceNote for which to get the language.
A pointer to the language string of the presence note, or NULL if no language is specified.

Sets the language of a presence note.
note
The SephonePresenceNote object for which to set the language.
lang
The language of the note.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

Increase the reference count of the SephonePresenceModel object.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which the reference count is to be increased.
The SephonePresenceModel object with the increased reference count.

Decrease the reference count of the SephonePresenceModel object and destroy it if it reaches 0.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which the reference count is to be decreased.
The SephonePresenceModel object if the reference count is still positive, NULL if the object has been destroyed.

Sets the user data of a SephonePresenceModel object.
model
The SephonePresenceModel object for which to set the user data.
user_data
A pointer to the user data to set.

model

A pointer to the user data.

Black list a friend. same as sephone_friend_set_inc_subscribe_policy() with SephoneSPDeny policy;

lf

memberdef.argsstring: (SalOp *op, const char *content_type, const char *content_subtype, const char *body, SalPresenceModel **result)
memberdef.name: sephone_notify_parse_presence

detaileddescription.para:
Create a SephonePresenceActivity with the given type and description.
lc
SephoneCore object.
acttype
The SephonePresenceActivityType to set for the activity.
description
An additional description of the activity to set for the activity. Can be NULL if no additional description is to be added.
The created SephonePresenceActivity object.

Create a default SephonePresenceModel.
lc
SephoneCore object.
The created SephonePresenceModel object.

Create a SephonePresenceModel with the given activity type and activity description.
lc
SephoneCore object.
acttype
The SephonePresenceActivityType to set for the activity of the created model.
description
An additional description of the activity to set for the activity. Can be NULL if no additional description is to be added.
The created SephonePresenceModel object.

memberdef.argsstring: (SephoneCore *lc, SephonePresenceActivityType acttype, const char *description, const char *note, const char *lang)
memberdef.name: sephone_core_create_presence_model_with_activity_and_note

detaileddescription.para:
Create a SephonePresenceModel with the given activity type, activity description, note content and note language.
lc
SephoneCore object.
acttype
The SephonePresenceActivityType to set for the activity of the created model.
description
An additional description of the activity to set for the activity. Can be NULL if no additional description is to be added.
note
The content of the note to be added to the created model.
lang
The language of the note to be added to the created model.
The created SephonePresenceModel object.

Create a SephonePresenceNote with the given content and language.
lc
SephoneCore object.
content
The content of the note to be created.
lang
The language of the note to be created.
The created SephonePresenceNote object.

Create a SephonePresencePerson with the given id.
lc
SephoneCore object
id
The id of the person to be created.
The created SephonePresencePerson object.

memberdef.argsstring: (SephoneCore *lc, const char *id, SephonePresenceBasicStatus basic_status, const char *contact)
memberdef.name: sephone_core_create_presence_service

detaileddescription.para:
Create a SephonePresenceService with the given id, basic status and contact.
lc
SephoneCore object.
id
The id of the service to be created.
basic_status
The basic status of the service to be created.
contact
A string containing a contact information corresponding to the service to be created.
The created SephonePresenceService object.
